summary: Better Map Marker Placements is a simple mod which modifies the placement of vanilla map markers to support a more immersive gameplay experience. Have you ever teleported to a place and thought \"I would have liked to have been moved a little closer..\" Well fret no longer!
descriptionHtml:
Better Map Marker Placements is a simple mod which modifies the placement of vanilla map markers to support a more immersive gameplay experience. Have you ever teleported to a place and thought \"I would have liked to been moved a little closer..\" Well fret no longer!

[color=red][u][b]THIS MOD IS INCOMPATABLE WITH ANY MODS THAT ALTER MAP MARKERS IN THE AFFECTED PLACES LISTED BELOW.[/b][/u][/color]

[b][u]Affected Places:[/b][/u]
[list]
[*]Riverwood
[*]College of Winterhold
[*]Ivarstead
[*]Dushnikh Yal
[*]High Hrothgar
[*]Nightingale Hall
[*]Dragons Reach
[/list]


[b][u]Future Updates:[/b][/u]
Other locations will be added in the future, but will be added sooner if you suggest them.


Please endorse my mod if you enjoyed it, and please post any comments/suggestions to help me make it even better!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]Better Map Marker Placements is also on the Skyrim Workshop [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1270455]Here[/url].[/b]

Also, check out my other mods!

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10330]The Man Cave[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13718]Better Thieves Guild[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14319]Better Item Sorting[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15107]Better Leveling Merchants and Speechcraft[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15446]Better Follower Dialogue Priority[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17020]No More Mine Pests[/url]
author: eagledude4
